app.title: Get more down with
app.description: Create, view, edit and manage tasks, break down your tasks to subtasks on the go, from any device.

school.title: What is RS School?
school.description: RS School is free-of-charge and community-based education program conducted by The Rolling Scopes developer community since 2013. Everyone can study at RS School, regardless of age, professional employment, or place of residence. The mentors and trainers of school are front-end and javascript developers from different companies and countries.
school.subtitle: RS School principles
school.fPrincipl-description: The RS School is working by the principle of 'Pay it forward'. Members of our community share their knowledge and check student's tasks for free. And we hope that our students will continue this work as our mentors in the future.
school.SPrincipl-description: Everyone can study at RS School, regardless of age, professional employment, or place of residence. Our platform and education materials are publicly available on GitHub and YouTube.

max.name: Maksim Karotkin
max.about: I'm junior frontend developer and team leader NG Team. I worked with NgRx functional and created a user functional. Helped with the other questions.

Ihar.name: Ihar Novikau
Ihar.about: A year ago, I didn't know about the existence of HTML and CSS, and now we have completed work on a project using the Angular framework. In this project, I was responsible for creating the page structure and localization of the application.

vika.name: Viktoryia Novikava
vika.about: I like to improve my skills in front-end development and create beauty, so in our team I worked on the design of the application.
